mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as num, adsa_no, user_id, user_name, baby_name, baby_birth, start_hope_month, waiting_no, receipt_date, office_name, req_date, baby_type, baby_rela, user_email, user_phone, apply_status, fam_typ_choi1, fam_typ_choi2, fam_typ_choi3, fam_typ_choi4, fam_typ_choi5, fam_typ_choi6 from (select adsa_no, A.user_id, user_name, baby_name, to_char(baby_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as baby_birth, substr(start_hope_month, 1, 4)||'년'||substr(start_hope_month, 5)||'월' AS start_hope_month, waiting_no, receipt_date, office_name, req_date, baby_type, baby_rela, A.user_email, A.user_phone, apply_status, fam_typ_choi1, fam_typ_choi2, fam_typ_choi3, fam_typ_choi4, fam_typ_choi5, fam_typ_choi6 from alldayserv_ap A, iusers B, office C where A.user_id = B.user_id and B.office_code = C.office_code)) where adsa_no = #{value}

select * from (select rownum as num, adsa_no, user_id, user_name, baby_name, baby_birth, start_hope_month, waiting_no, receipt_date, office_name, req_date from (select adsa_no, A.user_id, user_name, baby_name, to_char(baby_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as baby_birth, substr(start_hope_month, 1, 4)||'년'||substr(start_hope_month, 5)||'월' AS start_hope_month, waiting_no, receipt_date, office_name, req_date from alldayserv_ap A, iusers B, office C where A.user_id = B.user_id and B.office_code = C.office_code and A.user_id = #{value} order by adsa_no desc))

select * from (select rownum as num, adsa_no, user_id, user_name, baby_name, baby_birth, start_hope_month, waiting_no, receipt_date, office_name, req_date from (select adsa_no, A.user_id, user_name, baby_name, to_char(baby_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as baby_birth, substr(start_hope_month, 1, 4)||'년'||substr(start_hope_month, 5)||'월' AS start_hope_month, waiting_no, receipt_date, office_name, req_date from alldayserv_ap A, iusers B, office C where A.user_id = B.user_id and B.office_code = C.office_code order by req_date desc)) where num >= #{startList} and num <= #{endList}
mapper.insert: insert into alldayserv_ap values('allday_00'||adsa_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{baby_rela}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, null, #{baby_type}, #{start_hope_month}, #{baby_name}, #{baby_birth}, #{fam_typ_choi1}, #{fam_typ_choi2}, #{fam_typ_choi3}, #{fam_typ_choi4}, #{fam_typ_choi5}, #{fam_typ_choi6}, sysdate, (select max(WAITING_NO) + 1 from alldayserv_ap), '미접수', null)
mapper.update: update alldayserv_ap set receipt_date = sysdate, apply_status = '대기중' where adsa_no = #{value}
